item.title: Contributor to Gadget
item.author: Chuck Ha
item.description:
Gadget is a Go framework that speeds up the creation of a RESTful API server. It does a lot more than that and can be used as a full fledged web-server, but I find the most use is building out tiny RESTful APIs.

Here is a list of my contributions.

item.title: goenv
item.author: Chuck Ha
item.description:
This is a simple bash script I wrote to help manage Go workspaces.

To learn more, please see my blog post on the subject of using GOPATH effectively and take a look at the project README on Github
